title: A vision for sustainable restaurants
description: If you've been in a restaurant kitchen, you've seen how much food, water and energy can be wasted there. Chef Arthur Potts-Dawson shares his very personal vision for drastically reducing restaurant, and supermarket, waste -- creating recycling, composting, sustainable engines for good (and good food).
author: Arthur Potts Dawson
keywords: TED, talks, business, cities, culture, entertainment, food, global issues, sustainability
